EN:
Like a mirage, the fathoms of ego began to fall apart.

EN:
The Monolith had already left the Fathoms of Ego and was back at the center of the office.

私たちのいた事務室の形状がほぼ元通りになってきた頃、

<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>

원래 우리가 있었던 사무실의 형태가 거의 다 돌아올 때쯤, 또다시 품속에서 지직거리는 소리가 들려왔다.
EN:
Just as the office began to resemble the one we had walked into, the radio I carried began to buzz again.

Perfect! We really don't have much time left. Since it looks like the Monolith's briefly stabilized, lemme teach you how to lock it down.

우리가 알 수 있는 일은 아니다. 같은 회사의 부서라곤 하지만, 실제로 우리가 알 수 있는 건 ‘에즈라’라는 사람의 목소리뿐 아니었나.
EN:
That does not appear to be information we are privy to. Though we all work under the same company, all that the LCD shared with us was the name of our contact: 'Ezra'.

original:

<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
그, 그러하다면 설마 정말로 생체 실…
EN:
T-then, is Limbus Company truly kidnapping people for human experi—

original:
…そういうのがそんな簡単に始まることはない。
あの人も噂は噂に過ぎないって言ったろ。
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
…그런 게 그렇게 쉽게 시작되진 않아. 그 사람도 그냥 소문은 소문일 뿐이라고 했잖아.
EN:
... You don't just start experimenting on humans like that. It's not something that just happens. Remember what that LCD woman said? Rumors are just that: rumors.

original:

<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
그레고르는 옛날의 기억이 머릿속에 잡힌 듯 미간을 찌푸리며 담배를 찾았다.
EN:
Gregor furrowed his brows as though some unpleasant memories of the past began flooding in. He dug into his pockets for a cigarette.

original:

<CMT_JP>

<CMT_KR>

As we made our way back to the bus, I slowly began to organize my thoughts on everything that's happened.

でも、それがあまり役に立つことではないということも…分かってはいた。
<CMT_KR>

EN:
I did know that it wasn't the most productive thing for me to do.

<CMT_JP>

<CMT_JP>

EN:
It's like impatience is a prerequisite for boarding this bus, manager or Sinner.

EN:
Vergilius sighed as he muttered. He must've seen me burying my (clock)head in my palms.

Your journey will inevitably lead to the answers to all of your questions, Dante.

<CMT_JP>

Just follow the path, and it shall all be revealed. You have no reason to rush.

KR:

EN:

EN:
Hah, perhaps your impatience is rubbing off on me. I suppose I shall find out along the way as well.

EN:
Vergilius scoffed, muttered something incomprehensible to himself, then turned away from me. It was clear that he had no intention of continuing this exchange.
